Title: .NET UI controls for the Dojo Framework
Description: This project implements the Dojo Dijit widget library as ASP.NET server controls, making it easy to build a good looking and functional web interface from ASP.NET.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project implements the Dojo Dijit widget library as ASP.NET server controls, making it easy to build a good looking and functional web interface from ASP.NET.

"Dojo saves you time, delivers powerful performance, and scales with your development process. Itâ€™s the toolkit experienced developers turn to for building great web experiences." - http://www.dojotoolkit.org

Currently the project is it an alpha stage, but already the following dijit's are available:
  • Button
  • Colour Palette
  • Combo Box
  • Date Text Field
  • Drop Down Button
  • Horizontal Rule
  • Slider
  • Number Field
  • Text Area
  • Text Field
  • Toggle Button
  • Validation Text Field
  • Border Layout with Splitter
  • Panels with XHR loading
  • Popup Menu
  • Nested Menus
  • Draggable Dialog Window
  • Toolbar
  • Tabs
  • Custom Tooltips
